Dublin Core:Title: Viewing Station: Hippopotamus at the Chaffee Zoo
Dublin Core:Description: "The hippopotamus exhibit is dominated by a large pool that includes a beach and a meadow bordered by tall grasses. The visitor will view this habitat from a walkway passing through a marshy area that borders the existing pond in th area. ..."
